import React from 'react' const PortfolioItem = ({ show,close,image }) => { console.log(image) return (

Project Title

Gwendolyn is a platform built to help Players create, update, and share their character sheets either publically or to members of their own gaming group. It features an inventory tracking system for easily keeping track of your progress.

{/*

Project Title

Gwendolyn is a platform built to help Players create, update, and share their character sheets either publically or to members of their own gaming group. It features an inventory tracking system for easily keeping track of your progress. Frontend built using HTML, CSS, and Javascript. Backend built using Ruby on Rails and hosted using Heroku & AWS.

*/}
) } export default PortfolioItem
